thread.title: Investors Should Listen to Buffett’s Reinsurance Guru
thread.title_full: Investors Should Listen to Buffett’s Reinsurance Guru - WSJ

author: Paul J. Davies
title: Investors Should Listen to Buffett’s Reinsurance Guru
text:
When Ajit Jain can’t see value in reinsurance, investors across the industry should worry.
The man who runs Warren Buffett’s reinsurance business told The Wall Street Journal this summer that Berkshire Hathaway would be putting more money into normal commercial and retail insurance instead.
Mr. Jain’s views are almost as influential among... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
